DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect CyberKnife radiosurgery patient early stage organ-confined prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: CyberKnife Radiosurgery Organ-Confined Prostate Cancer : Homogenous Dose Distribution
DOC.detailed_description: The CyberKnife Robotic Radiosurgery System unique radiosurgical system capable treating tumor anywhere body noninvasively sub-millimeter accuracy . The CyberKnife System deliver radiation use precise target methodology allow focal treatment margin around target , thus limit volume adjacent tissue receive high dos radiation . This turn allow delivery high dos radiation prostate short series treatment .
DOC.criteria: Patient must least 18 year age Histologically proven prostate adenocarcinoma Patients belong one follow risk group : Low : CS T1bT2a Gleason 26 PSA ≤ 10 , Intermediate : CS T2b Gleason 26 PSA ≤ 10 CS T1bT2b , Gleason 26 PSA ≤ 20 ng/ml Gleason 7 PSA ≤ 10 ng/ml Prostate volume : ≤ 100 cc ECOG performance status 01 Prior prostatectomy cryotherapy prostate Prior radiotherapy prostate lower pelvis Implanted hardware material would prohibit appropriate treatment plan treatment delivery , investigator 's opinion Chemotherapy malignancy last 5 year History invasive malignancy ( prostate cancer , basal squamous skin cancer ) last 5 year . Hormone ablation two month prior enrollment , treatment .
